specialEvents.title: Administration of Oath of Office - Elected Officials
specialEvents.description: Judge Stacey K. Hydrick administered oath of office to Mayor-Elect Lynn Deutsch, Council Member-Elect Stacey Harris, Council Member-Elect Joe Seconder, and Council Member-Elect John Heneghan.
specialEvents.officiant: The Honorable Judge Stacey K. Hydrick

discussionItems.title: City Manager's Monthly Report
discussionItems.description: City Manager Eric Linton presented his monthly report. Council requested CIP projects be added to next report. Mayor requested shade structures contract be on next agenda under Business Items.

discussionItems.title: Five-Year Contract for License Plate Readers with Flock Safety
discussionItems.description: Deputy Chief Carlson presented the contract for a five-year contract for license plate readers with Flock Safety. The renewal locks in current rates. (Discussion only - no action taken)

speakers.name: Joe Bell
speakers.topic: Adams Parc subdivision stormwater basin erosion issue
speakers.summary: Property owner alerting Council for third time about severe erosion on his property due to stormwater basin issue. Has five-year battle with Adams Parc HOA. Meeting with Heneghan on January 12.

speakers.name: James Hufham
speakers.summary: Representing homeless woman sitting on park bench at Gate #1 of High Street project since September 2022. Requesting help getting her into humane shelter.

speakers.name: Judi Carlson
speakers.summary: Director of Malachi's Storehouse thanked City Council and staff for enormous support given over several years with ARPA money.
